summary: BRAND NEW VEHICLE, NOW HAS 200 MILES.  FROM BEGINNING, IT TRACKS TO THE RIGHT WHEN IN MOTION.  DEALER SAID ALIGNMENT IS PERFECT, THEY CROSS ROTATED TIRES, ARE IN PROCESS OF TRYING TO FIGURE IT OUT, BUT I SUSPECT IT MAY BE THE ELECTRONIC ASSIST STEERING INPUTTING RIGHT STEER FOR SOME REASON.  HAVE HEARD MANY COMPLAIN ABOUT STEERING BOX ISSUES WITH JEEP JL WRANGLERS, UNKNOWN IF THIS IS RELATED TO THAT.
